fig-text-grp.ptxt: NOTE: Follow the sealant manufacturer's instructions, and apply the sealer. Note the following items:

item.ptxt: Clean the areas to be sealed with wax and grease remover.
Wipe off any excess spot sealant with thinner. After the primer is sprayed, sealant will fill the area where the spot sealant was wiped.
Make sure you can see the sealant when the sealed part is in its proper location. For the details, refer to these diagrams:

ptxt.sie-ref01: Engine compartment, front wheelhouse, and damper housing

ptxt.sie-ref02: Dashboard upper, dashboard lower, and front floor

ptxt.sie-ref04: Roof panel, rear side outer panel, and rear panel

item.ptxt: When applying sealant to the engine compartment, the door openings, and the rear gutter, try to match the appearance of the factory sealant. Wipe off any excess sealant.
Apply sealant to any area that a replacement part will cover. Smooth the sealant with a brush if necessary.
